item.title: 2019 Stanford Commencement Timcook
item.description: Content Fourteen years ago, Steve stood on this stage and told your predecessors “Your time is limited. So don’t waste is living someone else’s life. So what is true then is true now. Don’t waste your time living someone else’s life. Don’t try to emulate the people who came before you.
